membership.expired: Hello {{name}}, your gym membership expired on {{date}}. Please renew your membership to continue using our facilities. Thank you!
membership.expiring: Hello {{name}}, your gym membership will expire on {{date}} ({{days}} days left). Please renew your membership to avoid any interruptions. Thank you!
membership.active: Hello {{name}}, your gym membership is active until {{date}}. Thank you for being a member!
membership.renewed: Hello {{name}}, your gym membership has been renewed successfully! Your new expiry date is {{date}}. Thank you for your support!
